title: How to write & conduct effective performance appraisals. V.2
brief_description: Program leader Jimmy Calano provides a seminar presentation where we learn the awful truth about performance appraisals - that they are a responsibility for which most of us were never trained. Provides the manager with a proven, ready-to-use performance appraisal system to help your employees progress in their careers!
